titleStmt.title: A sad, but a true relation of a person who on Munday the 15th. of this instant February, was found dead in a wood near Highgate; being first discried by the dogs of some gentlemen that were there hunting.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Croom, at the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle
